summary: Sweet FX setting for Relighting Skyrim + Pure Weather + ELE
descriptionHtml:
I let my screenshots tells explain this.
[u]
Requirement[/u]
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23364/?]SweetFX Shader Suite[/url] by [b]CeeJay[/b]

[u]Recommended mod[/u] ([size=2][i]more like Requirement tho, as this setting are made with these mods in use[/i][/size])
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim [/url]by NovakDalton
2) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather[/url] by Laast
3) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE[/url] by [b]--JawZ--[/b]

[u]Optional[/u]
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field[/url] by [b]Gopher and MyGoodEye[/b] ([i][size=2]While Pure Weather have its own DoF, having this on dynamic are too awesome to pass.[/size][/i])

[b]Installation[/b]

1) Install SweetFX.
2) Extract or copy all the files from this download into the Skyrim directory, allow to overwrite.

The installed files are:
[i] SweetFX_preset.txt
Really_SweetFX.txt
[/i]
Making it compatible with ENBoost.
1) Unzipped SweetFX package in a different folder.
2) Rename the file d3d9.dll into Sweet_d3d9.dll
3) Copy everything in Skyrim directory.
4) Open file enblocal.ini
5) Make sure these are set
[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=[b]true[/b]
ProxyLibrary=Sweet_d3d9.dll
[GLOBAL]
UsePatchSpeedhackWithoutGraphics=[b]true[/b]
6) Extract or copy all the files from this download into the Skyrim directory, allow to overwrite.

[b].::CREDIT::.[/b]
CeeJay.dk, for SweetFX .. or all this are not possible
Gamwich, for his texture mods, which I used all
Requiem team, Xarrian and now ogreboss, for they make Skyrim a better game overall.
and Bethesda.. for all the good time back from Arena and Daggerfall till Skyrim.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47231/?]ELFX VERSION[/url]
author: Deane
